project: CopywriterOS - Copywriter Agent Pipeline + Dan Koe
description: Create reusable AIOS artifacts (tasks, checklists, templates) for copywriter agent creation, then apply to Dan Koe as first use case.

userStories.title: Create Master Task: create-copywriter-agent.md
userStories.description: Create the main orchestrating task that guides the full copywriter agent creation process
acceptanceCriteria: Read existing tasks in tasks/ folder for format reference (avatar-research.md, copysearch.md)
Create task with proper YAML metadata (task_id, version, category, difficulty, dependencies, outputs)
Include 6 phases: 1-Setup, 2-Frameworks, 3-Communication DNA, 4-Signature Phrases, 5-Authority Arsenal, 6-Objection Algorithms, 7-Assembly
Each phase references its specific sub-task
Include elicit points for user input (copywriter name, source directory, etc)
Reference all checklists and templates created in other stories
Follow AIOS task format with Steps, checkpoints, and quality gates
All content in English
userStories.notes: Master orchestrator task. References all sub-tasks. This is the entry point for creating any copywriter agent.

userStories.title: Create Task: extract-frameworks.md
userStories.description: Create task for extracting operational frameworks from source materials
acceptanceCriteria: YAML metadata with dependencies on templates/frameworks-extraction-tmpl.yaml
Step-by-step process for: cataloging sources, identifying framework candidates, selecting top 10, documenting each
Define framework structure: name, category, origin, definition, principle, components, process, application, common_mistakes, examples
Include category enum: copywriting, offer_creation, marketing_strategy, sales, content, audience, product, mindset
Quality gates: exactly 10 frameworks, all fields complete, YAML valid
Reference david-ogilvy.md operational_frameworks as structure model
All content in English
userStories.notes: Sub-task for Phase 2 of master task.

userStories.title: Create Task: extract-communication-dna.md
userStories.description: Create task for extracting communication DNA (vocabulary, rhetoric, formulas)
acceptanceCriteria: YAML metadata with dependencies on templates/communication-dna-tmpl.yaml
Process for: mandatory words (15+), forbidden words (10+), signature vocabulary (10+ with definitions)
Process for: trigrams (20+), rhetorical devices (5+), quick formulas (5+ for different copy types)
Include psychometric integration section (DISC, MBTI, Enneagram influence on communication)
Quality gates: all minimums met, terms have context/usage notes
All content in English
userStories.notes: Sub-task for Phase 3 of master task.

userStories.title: Create Task: extract-signature-phrases.md
userStories.description: Create task for extracting 42+ signature phrases organized in tiers
acceptanceCriteria: YAML metadata with dependencies on templates/signature-phrases-tmpl.yaml
Process for identifying quotable phrases (standalone, memorable, original)
7-tier classification system with frequency guidance
Tier structure: 1-Core Mantras, 2-Methodology, 3-5 Theme-specific, 6-Philosophy, 7-Tactical
Each phrase requires: phrase (english), portuguese, context, source
Quality gates: minimum 42 phrases, 7 tiers defined, no duplicates
All content in English
userStories.notes: Sub-task for Phase 4 of master task.

userStories.title: Create Task: build-authority-arsenal.md
userStories.description: Create task for building authority proof arsenal (story, stats, templates)
acceptanceCriteria: YAML metadata with dependencies on templates/authority-arsenal-tmpl.yaml
Process for crucible_story extraction (4 acts: origin, struggle, breakthrough, mastery)
Process for authority_statistics compilation (career, results, recognition, reach)
Process for notable_products and notable_clients listing
Process for creating 4+ proof_stack_templates (transformation, results, credibility, social)
Quality gates: 4 acts complete, 5+ statistics, 4+ templates
All content in English
userStories.notes: Sub-task for Phase 5 of master task.

userStories.title: Create Task: create-objection-algorithms.md
userStories.description: Create task for creating objection handling algorithms
acceptanceCriteria: YAML metadata with dependencies on templates/objection-algorithms-tmpl.yaml
Process for identifying common objections from source materials
Algorithm structure: trigger, 5-step algorithm, resolution, key_phrases, framework_reference
Guidance on using copywriter's vocabulary and frameworks in responses
Quality gates: exactly 5 algorithms, each with 5 steps, all use copywriter's voice
All content in English
userStories.notes: Sub-task for Phase 6 of master task.

userStories.title: Create Checklist: copywriter-agent-creation-checklist.md
userStories.description: Create comprehensive validation checklist for copywriter agent creation
acceptanceCriteria: Read existing checklists for format reference (copywriter-quality-checklist.md)
Include Purpose and Scoring System sections
Section 1: Required Sections (activation-instructions, agent, persona, core_principles, commands, etc)
Section 2: Operational Frameworks (10 frameworks, complete structure, category diversity)
Section 3: Communication DNA (vocabulary counts, rhetoric devices, formulas)
Section 4: Signature Phrases (42+ phrases, 7 tiers, translations)
Section 5: Authority Arsenal (crucible story, statistics, templates)
Section 6: Objection Algorithms (5 algorithms, 5 steps each)
Section 7: Final Validation (YAML syntax, activation test, distinctiveness)
Scoring: 90-100% Excellent, 70-89% Good, <70% Needs revision
All content in English
userStories.notes: Used to validate any copywriter agent before deployment.

userStories.title: Create Template: copywriter-agent-tmpl.yaml
userStories.description: Create the master template for copywriter agent file structure
acceptanceCriteria: Read david-ogilvy.md and alex-hormozi.md for reference structure
Include all required sections with placeholder markers
Sections: IDE-FILE-RESOLUTION, REQUEST-RESOLUTION, activation-instructions, agent, persona, core_principles, commands
Sections: operational_frameworks (10 slots), communication_dna, signature_phrases (7 tiers)
Sections: authority_proof_arsenal, objection_algorithms (5 slots), {copywriter}_rules, security, dependencies, capabilities
Include MMOS Integration Note placeholder
Add comments explaining each section's purpose
All content in English
userStories.notes: Master template used to generate any copywriter agent file.

userStories.title: Create Template: frameworks-extraction-tmpl.yaml
userStories.description: Create template for extracted frameworks output
acceptanceCriteria: Header: copywriter name, extraction date, total frameworks, source files count
Framework structure with all required fields
Category enum definition
Example framework filled in as reference
All content in English
userStories.notes: Output template for extract-frameworks task.

userStories.title: Create Template: communication-dna-tmpl.yaml
userStories.description: Create template for communication DNA output
acceptanceCriteria: Header: copywriter name, extraction date
Vocabulary section: mandatory_words, forbidden_words, signature_vocabulary
Trigrams section with frequency guidance
Rhetorical devices section with description/example/usage fields
Quick formulas section for different copy types
Psychometric influence section
All content in English
userStories.notes: Output template for extract-communication-dna task.

userStories.title: Create Template: signature-phrases-tmpl.yaml
userStories.description: Create template for signature phrases output
acceptanceCriteria: Header: copywriter name, extraction date, total phrases, source files
7 tier sections with frequency guidance
Phrase structure: phrase, portuguese, context, source
Example phrases for each tier
All content in English
userStories.notes: Output template for extract-signature-phrases task.

userStories.title: Create Template: authority-arsenal-tmpl.yaml
userStories.description: Create template for authority arsenal output
acceptanceCriteria: Header: copywriter name, extraction date
Crucible story structure: 4 acts with year, context, challenges, lesson fields
Authority statistics sections: career, results, recognition, reach
Notable products and clients sections
Proof stack templates section
All content in English
userStories.notes: Output template for build-authority-arsenal task.

userStories.title: Create Template: objection-algorithms-tmpl.yaml
userStories.description: Create template for objection algorithms output
acceptanceCriteria: Header: copywriter name, extraction date, total algorithms
Algorithm structure: name, trigger, 5 steps, resolution, key_phrases, framework_reference
Example algorithm filled in
All content in English
userStories.notes: Output template for create-objection-algorithms task.

userStories.title: Execute Task: Extract Dan Koe Frameworks
userStories.description: Apply extract-frameworks task to Dan Koe source materials
acceptanceCriteria: Read extract-frameworks.md task completely
Read frameworks-extraction-tmpl.yaml template
Process ALL 45 source files in MM Dan/ directory
Identify and extract 10 operational frameworks
Frameworks must include: PASTOR, Godfather Offer, Content Pyramid, Risk Reversal, Sales Page Framework, DM Seduction Method, etc
Each framework fully documented with all required fields
Output follows template structure
Save to outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/frameworks.yaml
userStories.notes: First execution using the new task/template system.

userStories.title: Execute Task: Extract Dan Koe Communication DNA
userStories.description: Apply extract-communication-dna task to Dan Koe source materials
acceptanceCriteria: Read extract-communication-dna.md task completely
Read communication-dna-tmpl.yaml template
Read dan koe.json psychometric profile
Process ALL 45 source files for language patterns
Extract 15+ mandatory words, 10+ forbidden words, 10+ signature vocabulary
Extract 20+ trigrams, 5+ rhetorical devices, 5+ quick formulas
Include psychometric influence analysis
Save to outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/communication-dna.yaml
userStories.notes: Uses psychometric profile for deeper analysis.

userStories.title: Execute Task: Extract Dan Koe Signature Phrases
userStories.description: Apply extract-signature-phrases task to Dan Koe source materials
acceptanceCriteria: Read extract-signature-phrases.md task completely
Read signature-phrases-tmpl.yaml template
Process ALL 45 source files for quotable phrases
Extract minimum 42 signature phrases
Organize in 7 tiers with appropriate frequency guidance
Each phrase has english, portuguese, context, source
Save to outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/signature-phrases.yaml
userStories.notes: Focus on memorable, standalone, original phrases.

userStories.title: Execute Task: Build Dan Koe Authority Arsenal
userStories.description: Apply build-authority-arsenal task to Dan Koe source materials
sourceFiles: outputs/minds/dan_koe/sources/MM Dan/03 - A Breakdown Of My Previous Twitter Agency.md
outputs/minds/dan_koe/sources/MM Dan/36 - How I Made $3000 Per Month With 300 Followers.md
acceptanceCriteria: Read build-authority-arsenal.md task completely
Read authority-arsenal-tmpl.yaml template
Read psychometric profile and autobiographical articles
Build crucible story with 4 acts (origin, struggle, breakthrough, mastery)
Compile verifiable statistics (revenue, followers, products)
Create 4+ proof stack templates
Save to outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/authority-arsenal.yaml
userStories.notes: Focus on his journey: 7 failures â†’ $2.6M/year.

userStories.title: Execute Task: Create Dan Koe Objection Algorithms
userStories.description: Apply create-objection-algorithms task using Dan Koe's frameworks and phrases
acceptanceCriteria: Read create-objection-algorithms.md task completely
Read objection-algorithms-tmpl.yaml template
Read previously extracted frameworks and phrases
Create 5 objection algorithms for common objections
Each algorithm uses Dan Koe's vocabulary and references his frameworks
Include key phrases and framework references
Save to outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/objection-algorithms.yaml
userStories.notes: Objections: no time, don't know what to write, niche saturated, not expert, need followers.

userStories.title: Execute Task: Create Dan Koe Specific Rules
userStories.description: Extract Dan Koe's specific rules for writing, content, business, mindset
acceptanceCriteria: Process ALL 45 source files for explicit rules and advice
Extract 8+ writing rules
Extract 6+ content strategy rules
Extract 6+ business rules
Extract 6+ mindset rules
All rules directly from source materials (quote or close paraphrase)
Format as actionable imperatives
Save to outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/dan-koe-rules.yaml
userStories.notes: Rules like: 'Content is 80% research', 'People buy systems that get results'.

userStories.title: Assemble Dan Koe Agent File
userStories.description: Combine all extracted components into final dan-koe.md agent file
acceptanceCriteria: Read copywriter-agent-tmpl.yaml template
Read david-ogilvy.md as structure reference
Read ALL analysis files from outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/
Fill template with all extracted content
Create proper activation-instructions, agent, persona sections
Include all 10 operational frameworks
Include complete communication_dna
Include all 42+ signature phrases in 7 tiers
Include authority_proof_arsenal
Include 5 objection_algorithms
Include dan_koe_rules section
Include security, dependencies, knowledge_areas, capabilities
Add MMOS Integration Note
Save to expansion-packs/copywriter-os/agents/dan-koe.md
userStories.notes: Final assembly. Combines all extracted components.

userStories.title: Validate Dan Koe Agent
userStories.description: Validate completed agent against checklist and test activation
acceptanceCriteria: Read copywriter-agent-creation-checklist.md completely
Run through ALL checklist sections on dan-koe.md
Verify 10 operational frameworks present and complete
Verify 42+ signature phrases in 7 tiers
Verify 5 objection algorithms with 5 steps each
Verify communication_dna completeness
Verify authority_proof_arsenal completeness
Validate YAML syntax
Compare structure against david-ogilvy.md
Calculate overall score (target: 90%+)
Document any issues found
Create validation report at outputs/minds/dan_koe/analysis/validation-report.md
userStories.notes: Final quality gate. Agent must score 90%+ on checklist.

phases.phase1_artifacts: US-001 to US-013 (AIOS tasks, checklists, templates)
phases.phase2_extraction: US-014 to US-019 (Dan Koe data extraction)
